org.dblp

Interface DblpInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCoauthorGraph, SimpleCoauthorGraph, SimpleLazyCoauthorGraph, WeightedCoauthorGraph
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface DblpInterface
    The root interface for accessing data from any dblp DB structure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods

        default java.util.Collection<Publication> getPublications(Person pers)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of the publications of a given person in dblp.
        Parameters:
        pers - The person.
        Returns:
        The publications. If pers == null, then this method will return an empty collection.

      • numberOfPublications

        default int numberOfPublications(Person pers)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieve the number of publications of a given person in dblp.
        Parameters:
        pers - The person.
        Returns:
        The number of publications of that person. If pers == null, then this method will return 0.

      • getPublications

        default java.util.Collection<Publication> getPublications(PersonName name)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of the publications of a given person in dblp. Publications of any alias name of the given name are retrieved, too.
        Parameters:
        name - The person.
        Returns:
        The publications. If the given person name is not in dblp, then this method will return an empty collection.

      • publications

        default java.util.stream.Stream<Publication> publications(PersonName name)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieves a sequential stream of the publications of a given person in dblp. Publications of any alias name of the given name are retrieved, too.
        Parameters:
        name - The person.
        Returns:
        The stream of publications. If the given person name is not in dblp, then this method will return an empty stream.

      • numberOfPublications

        default int numberOfPublications(PersonName name)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieve the number of publications of a given person. Publications of any alias name of the given name are counted, too.
        Parameters:
        name - The person.
        Returns:
        The number of publications of that person. If the given person name is not in dblp, then this method will return 0.

        Deprecated.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The person, or null if there is no such person.

      • hasPersonByName

        boolean hasPersonByName(java.lang.String name)
                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Deprecated. 
        Checks whether a person with the exact given dblp person name is present in dblp. The person name must include any potential homonym number.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the person to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the person with the specified key is present, otherwise false .
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified name is null.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Person object, or null if there is no such person.
        Throws:

                     Person second)

      • getCoauthorCommunity

        java.util.Collection<Person> getCoauthorCommunity(Person person,
                                                  int index)
                                           throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                  java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieve a specific coauthor community of a given person.
        Parameters:
        person - The person.
        index - The community index.
        Returns:
        The coauthors of this community.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified person is null.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= getNumberOfCommunities())

      • getCoauthorCommunityIndex

        default int getCoauthorCommunityIndex(Person person,
                                      Person coauthor)
                               throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieve the community index of a coauthor of a given person.
        Parameters:
        person - The central person.
        coauthor - The coauthor to look up in the coauthor communities of person.
        Returns:
        The community index between 0 and getNumberOfCommunities()), or -1 if no such coauthor exists.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if one of the specified persons is null.

        Parameters:
        person - The person.
        Returns:
        The coauthors of this community.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified person is null.
